Description.Text: Lotte City Hotel Tashkent Palace is a luxurious 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Tashkent. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, gym and multiple restaurants. Tashkent is the capital of Uzbekistan and was once a prominent trading centre on the ancient Silk Road. The cityscape reflects its Soviet past, but today there are also a large number of modern building developments, open spaces and museums. Places of interest include Independence Square (Mustaqillik Maydoni), Amir Timur Museum and Teleshayakh Mosque, home to what is considered to be the oldest Quran in existence. Local metro services provide fast and easy access to other popular Tashkent destinations. The hotel is housed in a grand mid-rise property built in 1958 with a classic-style facade. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, gym and sauna. A range of massages, beauty and spa treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are 27sqm and decorated in a bright, classic style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include satellite TV, soundproofing, tea and coffee equipment, a safe, mini-bar and an en-suite bathroom. Tashkent Restaurant serves regional and international dishes in an elegant setting, whilst Sharq Yulduzi is a seasonal rooftop restaurant that allows for al-fresco dining in summer. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the 24-hour Piano Bar, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. There is also a chargeable airport shuttle service.
